TopicTitle: Computing delta-v in Asparagus stalk boosters?

Articles.Content: I am trying to calculate the total dv I get from an Asparagus-stalk booster setup. Does anyone know how the rocket equation must be modified to achieve this?
This is just a total guess by the way, but if you calculate each section of flight, first with all boosters, then the next "stage" then the next, separately, can you combine the results?
That makes sense. I'll give it a try
Salvager is right, to my knowledge - no modification is necessary.
